an7.37:1.1: “Mendicants, when a friend has seven qualities you should associate with, accompany, and attend them, even if they drive you away.
an7.37:1.3: They’re likable, agreeable, respected, and admired. They admonish you and they accept admonishment. They speak on deep matters. And they don’t urge you to do bad things.
an7.37:1.4: When a friend has these seven qualities you should associate with, accompany, and attend them, even if they drive you away.
an7.37:2.4: and doesn’t urge you to do bad.
an7.37:3.2: these things are found is your friend.
an7.37:3.3: If you want to have a friend,
an7.37:3.5: then even if they chase you away,
an7.37:3.6: you should keep company with that sort.”
